name: whatsapp-chatbot
description: 1. Create a [Meta Developer App](https://developers.facebook.com/) 2. Add the WhatsApp product 3. Generate a permanent access token 4. Copy your `Phone Number ID` and paste it in `bot.js` 5. Deploy this project (Render, Railway, Vercel) 6. In Meta Dashboard → WhatsApp → Configuration → Configure Webhooks:    - Callback URL: `https://your-domain.com/webhook`    - Verify Token: `my_verify_token`
